page.title: 15Guston Court Farm
page.content: Owned by Mr.Goddard. Been in the family since 1942. Comprises dairying and pig breeding. DAIRYING :-125 milking cows giving 7250 litres of milk per cow a year (maximum allowed by Govt quota). Fed on home produced silage and grain and bought concentrates. Outside grazing in summer, inside feeding controlled by computer in winter. Very efficient. Milk collected 0730 each day. PIG BREEDING :-100 sows & 5 boars, breeding s intensive. Piglets never see light o day and are expected to reach target eight of 140lbs by 17 weeks from birth. 2000 slaughtered each year which go to local butchers or Fatstock Market Corp. in Canterbury. STAFF :-Cowman, pigman, 2 tractor drivers, 1 farmers boy. Rents 441 acres from MOD used for grazing young and resting milk cows.
